CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 14 reads: "Pitt Coronation - Mary Fuget, right, drew the second highest honor the University of Pittsburgh can bestow upon a woman undergraduate student. She was chosen as Alma mater.  Here she crowns Adele Marraccini, who was selected at eh Senior Queen.  The other two aides are Donna Parks and Betty Klein.  Miss Fuget, aided by $2,700 raised by friends, a scholarship and a grant form the university, leaves next week for India, where she will spend the summer as a student goodwill ambassador. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Donna Parks, Betty Klein, and Mary Fuget, crowning "Senior Queen" Adele Marraccini during coronation ceremony at the Cathedral of Learning, University of Pittsburgh, another version
